ing: 1 packet peaches and cream flavor instant oatmeal
2 packets granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®) (optional)
des: "This is a lightly tasting smoothie that will fill you up! Perfect breakfast smoothie! Made with instant oatmeal, yogurt and banana."
ins: Place the milk, yogurt, banana, instant oatmeal, sweetener, and ice cubes into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.
